name: ashnews
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: ashnews is a simple program using PHP/MySQL that allows you to easily add a news/blog system to your site.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<td align="center"><font face=Arial size=1>News powered by <a href=http:\/\/projects.ashwebstudio.com>ashnews v([\d\.]+)<\/a><\/font><\/td>)
